attributes.action: Reduce petrol prices to help industry and public.
attributes.additional_details: The Government must take into consideration the rate at which petrol prices are escalating. If these petrol prices carry on, then the public will be worse off in jobs etc. For Industry higher prices will force up retail prices. This will have a knock on effect once again to the public. The circle of knock-backs to the public have to stop to prevent poverty in this country.
